title: boot ubuntu ultimate edition from usb hdd poblem.........

forumNotes.author: copain
forumNotes.content:
hi all   
i wanna make a live usb persistent ue2.5...i have tried unetbootin and the inbuilt usb start up creator..by doing both ways only startup screen comes with different options and when i select the 'start or install' option,only a black screen with ue symbol globe rotating in the center comes and nothing else...  
any solution ??  
plz give ur advice.........
